 ██║╔═══╝  ██║╔═██║║ ██║╔═══╝  ███████╗  ██║╔═██║╗ ███████║║ ╚██████╗  ╚██████╔╝║ ╚██████╔╝║    ██║║
 ╚═╝║      ╚═╝║ ╚═╝║ ╚═╝║      ╚══════╝╗ ╚═╝║ ╚═╝║ ╚══════╝║  ╚═════╝╗  ╚═════╝╔╝  ╚═════╝╔╝    ╚═╝║

Navigate arXiv findings with PaperScout.

Paste an arXiv URL in the Composer
Type an arXiv URL or identifier below and press Enter to fetch metadata.
Shift+Enter adds a new line; Esc clears the composer.
Paste an arXiv url or identifier to begin.
